channel.title: Walden, VT on
channel.description: Recent content in Walden, VT on

item.title: A 200 Year Old Buckle and Button
item.description: I found both of these relics on the same day in April of 2016 along the edge of an old road. They were about 75 feet apart from each other. Both items appear to be from the late 1700’s and were likely lost by the first generation of settlers in Walden, Vermont. Front View Rear View Â The button is 30 [mm] in diameter and is made of a brass alloy called tombac.

item.title: The Bayley-Hazen Military Road
item.description: I have always been fascinated by this Revolutionary War era military road. Below is a description of the Walden portion of the route written by Olive & Maurice Eddy in 1958/59. The Bayley-Hazen Military Road - Town of Walden Cover
